prompt: Slow pan shot of an ancient Javanese kingdom, then transition to Dayang Sumbi walking in a stop-motion forest with a dog.
Close-up shot on Dayang Sumbi weaving, then a close-up on the crafted spinning wheel falling.
Close-up shot of Dayang Sumbi's face as she speaks, then quick transition to Tumang moving.
Close-up on Tumang's mouth holding the tool, then a close-up on Dayang Sumbi's surprised face.
A brief montage of the stop-motion marriage, followed by a shot of them with a clay baby.
A quick stop-motion montage of Sangkuriang and Tumang hunting in the forest.
Close-up on Dayang Sumbi, then a shot of Sangkuriang leaving with Tumang.
Panning shot showing an empty, clay forest, with Sangkuriang and Tumang looking defeated.
Close-up on Sangkuriang's conflicted face, then a brief, fast cut of the arrow being released.
Close-up on Sangkuriang holding the heart, then a slow stop-motion shot of him walking away.
Close-up on the clay heart being given, then a stop-motion montage of Dayang Sumbi cooking and eating.
Close-up on Sangkuriang's clay face as he confesses, then a jump scare-like transition to Dayang Sumbi's enraged clay face.
Close-up shot on Dayang Sumbi's hand hitting Sangkuriang's clay head, then a stop-motion shot of Sangkuriang leaving.
A quick stop-motion montage of Sangkuriang wandering through different sculpted clay landscapes and learning from a clay wise man.
A wide shot of a modern clay village, then a close-up on Sangkuriang's surprised face.
A shot of Sangkuriang walking, then a close-up of a beautiful woman.
Close-up on their hands holding each other, a shot of their happy faces.
A shot of Sangkuriang talking to Dayang Sumbi, followed by a close-up of his clay head.
Close-up on the scar on Sangkuriang's head. Close-up on Dayang Sumbi's shocked clay face, then a shot of Sangkuriang speaking.
Close-up on Dayang Sumbi's clay face as her expression changes from shock to certainty.
Close-up on Sangkuriang and Dayang Sumbi's hands, then a shot of their faces in conflict.
Wide shot of Dayang Sumbi pointing to a hill. Sangkuriang nods confidently.
A quick stop-motion montage showing Sangkuriang working with the help of numerous clay genies.
Close-up on Dayang Sumbi's shocked clay face, then a shot of the almost-finished clay lake and boat.
A shot of Dayang Sumbi talking to the villagers, then a shot of the villagers unfurling a huge red cloth.
Close-up on Sangkuriang's enraged clay face, then a wide shot of the red sky.
Slow-motion shot of the clay dam breaking, with a huge torrent of clay water flooding the land.
Slow-motion shot of Sangkuriang kicking the clay boat, with the boat flying through the air.
A wide shot of the upside-down clay boat falling and turning into a mountain.
A beautiful, serene stop-motion shot of Tangkuban Perahu in the morning mist.
